channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New York mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani challenges Donald Trump in victory speech as Democrats win key US election races – as it happened
item.description: This live blog is now closed, our new live blog is here at the Ziegfeld Ballroom in midtown Manhattan There’s a couple of hundred Cuomo supporters at ...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani elected New York City mayor | First Thing
item.description: Democratic socialist’s campaign was fueled by small-dollar donations and tens of thousands of volunteers. Plus, Dick Cheney dies aged 84 Good morning....

item.title: Several injured after man ‘deliberately’ drives car into people on French island

item.title: Democrat Zohran Mamdani sweeps to victory in New York City mayoral election and lays down challenge to Trump - live
item.description: The 34-year-old democratic socialist secured victory with more than 50% of the vote Zohran Mamdani elected mayor of New York City Prop 50: Californian...

item.title: Multiple people reported injured after car driven into pedestrians on French island – Europe live
item.description: Interior minister says suspect is in custody after reports of a car intentionally ramming into pedestrians and cyclists on the island of Oleron The Su...

item.title: M&S profits halved after cyber attack cost company £100m
item.description: Marks & Spencer's online and in-store sales were hit by a cyber attack which it said cost it £101m

item.title: Trader who inspired The Big Short and now bets against AI sends tech shares lower
item.description: Shares of major tech companies have fallen in the US and Japan over fears about AI bubble

item.title: Several critically injured after driver rams into 10 people on French island
item.description: A man in his early 30s drove deliberately into people on the Ile d'Oléron off the French coast, a local mayor says.

item.title: Mortgages and AI to be added to the curriculum in English schools
item.description: Ministers are making the changes for children in England after a review of what is taught in schools.
